---
id: validate-team-name
title: "Validate organization team name"
description: "Confirms that the given team name is valid and available for use within the organization. Append `?name=<your_team_name>` to specify the name to validate."

hide_title: true

---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Validate organization team name"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/{orgId}/teams/validate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Confirms that the given team name is valid and available for use within the organization. Append `?name=<your_team_name>` to specify the name to validate.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
